text:
I will try to give you a brief description about this...

creator: denizdurmus87@gmail.com

text: This is not a bug and Bugzilla is not a support forum. You have already asked about this on the users list and been told what the problem is. Please continue this on the users list.
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
okay, and as a head-ups, nobody told me anything about the problem on the list...

thank you for your response
creator: denizdurmus87@gmail.com
